name: Mini Chocolate Chip Shortbread Cookies
author: patticake
summary: My sister and I have been making these cookies for years. They are simple and delicious without the eggs! Double the recipe, they go fast.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) package miniature chocolate chips, divided
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Mix flour, butter, sugar, and vanilla extract in a bowl until dough is smooth
Reserve 1/4 the chocolate chips; stir remaining chips into dough until evenly distributed
Roll dough into 24 small logs and place a baking sheet
Bake in preheated oven until slightly golden around the edges, 15 to 20 minutes
Cool in baking sheet for 10 minutes before removing to cool completely on a wire rack
Melt shortening in a small saucepan over medium-low heat; stir in reserved chocolate chips until melted, about 5 minutes
Dip cookies into chocolate and return to baking sheet
